name: Of Mouse and Man
description:
You are weird thief... as not many of your kind have a power to transform into mouse! Make your way to the exit of dungeons, and don't make enemies catch you!

Of Mouse and Man

Created for Global Game Jam - PolyJam 2022 edition

Jan "ChanJohann" Dzyr Project Leader, Game Design, Audio Programming, Sound Design

Bartosz "Warmek" Game Design, Programming

Cyprian "SirCypkowskyy" Gburek Game Design,Programming, UI

Kostya Pshenychnyy Game Design, 3D Graphics

Oskar Światowski Game Design, Music / Sound Design
